price: Mo a moagye adie, monsuro Nyankopͻn na (εberε biara mu no) monka kasa pa.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waqūlū qawlan sadīdan
